Passive.Name: Drunken Carnival
Passive.Description: Increases Crit Rate by %s%. After targeting a companion with their Persona, increase the Crit DMG of the skill's primary target by %s% for 2 turns.

Inate.Name: Revolution
Inate.Description: Increase all allies CRIT Rate by %s%. Allies will gain an additional %s% CRIT Rate for every 10% Crit Rate Wonder has up to maximum of %s%. This effect lasts three turns.

Combat.Name: Combat Skills
Combat.Description:
HIGHLIGHT: Increase damage dealt by all allies by %s% for 2 turns.

ONE MORE: Deal Psi Damage to 1 enemy

Passive.Name: Frozen Decision
Passive.Description: Increases Defense by 37.4%. When adding a shield to a teammate, the primary target gains%sa %s% increase in Defense %s a %s% increase in Frozen Damage for 2 turns.

Inate.Name: Shelter of the Snow King
Inate.Description: Give all companions a %s% Attack Power + %s shield and increase their defense by 30% for 2 turns.

Combat.Name: Combat Skills
Combat.Description:
HIGHLIGHT: Generate a shield equal to %s% ATK + %s to all allies.

ONE MORE: Deal Ice damage to 1 enemy.
